Package parallel

parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferIntf
    Interface for classes that implement bounded or unbounded, synchronized or unsynchronized buffers operating in FIFO order.
    ComparableTaskObject
    empty interface for use with dynamic, priority-based task msg-passing coordinators and executors.
    TaskObject
    interface defining what a TaskObject must support.
    ThreadSpecificComparableTaskObject
    interface for use with dynamic, priority-based task msg-passing coordinators and executors.
    ThreadSpecificTaskObject
    interface indicates that a specific Runnable must be run on a thread with the specified thread-id (or any thread, or any thread except a specific one).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    atomic
    A class implementing the <atomic> critical section protocol in Java.
    atomictest
    test-driver for the atomic class.
    atomictest.T
    auxiliary inner-class not part of the public API.
    Barrier
    A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
    BarrierTest
    test-driver for the Barrier class.
    BarrierTest.BThread
    auxiliary inner class, not part of the public API.
    BBAUTest
    test driver class for the BoundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized class and in particular its remove(Object,int) method.
    BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator
    The BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
    BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest
    test-driver for the BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class.
    BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest.MPThread3
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator
    The BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another Singleton class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
    BlockingMsgPassingTest
    test-driver class for BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator class.
    BlockingMsgPassingTest.MPThread2
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    BoundedBuffer
    a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as a cyclic doubly-linked list.
    BoundedBufferArray
    a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array.
    BoundedBufferArrayTest
    test-driver for BoundedBufferArray class.
    BoundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized
    a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array that is totally unsynchronized.
    BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized
    a bounded-length Min-Heap data structure, supporting insert/remove-min/ decrease-key operations in O(logN) time.
    BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized.BoundedMinHeapIterator
    auxiliary nested class to provide an java.util.Iterator interface for traversing this min-heap (in order).
    BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized.PairSecondArgDblComparator
    auxiliary static inner-class used as default comparator for heap.
    ComplexBarrier
    A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
    ComplexBarrierTest
    test-driver for the ComplexBarrier class.
    ComplexBarrierTest.CBThread
    auxiliary inner class not part of the public API.
    ConditionCounter
    implements a "condition" counter, so that when the object's counter reaches a specified number, it releases a notification for any waiting thread to resume execution.
    DATE2Test
    class exercises DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor2 functionality by utilizing the Fib task: computing recursively in parallel the Fibonacci sequence using essentially a Fork-Join pattern (originally proposed for java by Doug Lea in his util.concurrent java package, based on the Cilk framework).
    DATE2Test.Fib
    auxiliary inner-class implements the fork-join style of recursive computation of Fibonacci numbers, not part of the public API.
    DATE2Test.TSFib
    auxiliary inner-class extends the Fib class, and specifies the thread on which it must be executed, not part of the public API.
    DATE3Test
    class exercises DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor3 functionality by utilizing the Fib task: computing recursively in parallel the Fibonacci sequence using essentially a Fork-Join pattern (originally proposed for java by Doug Lea in his util.concurrent java package, based on the Cilk framework).
    DATE3Test.Fib
    auxiliary inner-class implements the fork-join style of recursive computation of Fibonacci numbers, not part of the public API.
    DATE3Test.TSFib
    auxiliary inner-class extends the Fib class, and specifies the thread on which it must be executed, not part of the public API.
    DMCoordinator
    Class providing proper synchronization between readers and writers.
    DMCTest
    minimal test-driver to test the DMCoordinator class.
    DMCTest.DMCThread
    auxiliary static inner-class not part of the public API.
    DMCTest2
    class simulates the data access synchronization processes in AMORE (AIT MOvie Recommendation Engine).
    DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor
    A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently tasks implementing the Runnable interface.
    DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor2
    an enhancement over DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor in that it augments its threads in its thread-pool with two local queues so that they first look for tasks in their "hot" local queue, then if no task is in the global queue either available for execution, they finally go into the "cold" queue.
    DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor3
    Exactly the same as DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor2 class, only that the thread-pool's threads' hot local queue is also unbounded (as is the cold local queue), as is the global shared queue, so that all associated queues are unbounded, and therefore do not act as "synchronizers" between the executor threads (see Brian Goetz et al "Java Concurrency in Practice").
    FairDMCoordinator
    A read-write lock mechanism implementing the notion of fairness of granting requests, in that the first thread to execute the code a request, will get their request serviced before the second one.
    FasterParallelAsynchBatchPriorityTaskExecutor
    A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently batch of tasks implementing the ComparableTaskObject interface (or the extending interface, ThreadSpecificComparableTaskObject encapsulating the requirement that the task be run on a thread with a particular thread-id).
    FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor
    A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
    FDMCTest
    tests the FairDMCoordinator class methods.
    FDMCTest.FDMCThread
    auxiliary inner-class not part of the public API.
    FIFOLock
    class that ensures First-In-First-Served lock acquisition among threads.
    FIFOLockTest
    tests the FIFOLock class methods.
    FIFOLockTest.FIFOLockThread
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    FPABTETest
    test-driver for the FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor class.
    FPABTETest.TestTask
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    LimitedTimeTaskExecutor
    A class that allows its users to execute tasks (object that describe some computation that must implement the TaskObject interface) for a limited time, starting them in different threads than the thread that called the execute(task) method.
    Lock
    Standard Lock mechanism for thread coordination.
    LTTETest
    test-driver for the LimitedTimeTaskExecutor class.
    LTTETest.ComputeTask
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    MsgPassingCoordinator
    The MsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    MsgPassingTest
    test-driver for MsgPassingCoordinator class (send/recvData() methods).
    MsgPassingTest.MPThread
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    NoOpTask
    defines a "no-op" TaskObject.
    OrderedBarrier
    OrderedBarrier guarantees that if threads are synchronized via this class, any tasks given as args to the orderedBarrier(task) call, will execute in the order with which the threads executing them were first registered with the barrier (via the addThread(thread) call).
    OrderedBarrierTest
    test-driver for OrderedBarrier.
    OrderedBarrierTest.OBThread
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    OrderedBarrierTest.TO
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    PABTETest
    test-driver for ParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor class.
    PABTETest.TestTask
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    ParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor
    A class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
    ParallelBatchTaskExecutor
    A class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
    PBTETest
    test-driver for ParallelBatchTaskExecutor class.
    PBTETest.TestTask
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    PBTEThread
    auxiliary class implementing the threads of the thread-pool of the class ParallelBatchTaskExecutor class, not part of the public API.
    ReduceOpBase
    A class implementing the Reduce concept in parallel/distributed computing.
    ReduceOperator
    Base abstract class for reduction operations (such as MIN/MAX/SUM/AGGR etc.)
    ReduceOperatorMaxDbl
    find the maximum double value in the data values of the threadsData table.
    ReduceOperatorMinDbl
    find the minimum double value in the data values of the threadsData table.
    ReduceOperatorSumDbl
    find the sum of double values in the data values of the threadsData table.
    RegisteredParcel
    This is an auxiliary helper class for the *MsgPassingCoordinator classes.
    RegisteredParcelPool
    The class is responsible for maintaining a sufficiently large array of RegisteredParcel objects, and there will be a pool for each thread of execution.
    RegisteredParcelPoolFailTest
    Tests the RegisteredParcel-pooling mechanism to show-case that in general it is broken in the presence of multiple msg-passing coordinators and multiple thread sending/receiving msgs among many of them.
    RegisteredParcelPoolFailTest.RPFailTestThread
    auxiliary inner-class part of the setup for showing that the RegisteredParcelPool design pattern is generally broken for message passing coordinators (except for the BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator); not part of the public API.
    RegisteredParcelThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local RegisteredParcel object pools.
    Semaphore
    Class implementing the classical notion of Semaphores as "permits".
    SemaphoreTest
    test-driver for Semaphore class.
    SemaphoreTest.ST
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    SFMPCOld
    helper class for RegisteredParcelPoolFailTest class.
    SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator
    The SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator
    The SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator class: yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    TimerThread
    Utility class, similar (but simpler) to the ones found in concurrent utils.
    UBAUTest
    tests the UnboundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized against java.util.{ArrayList,ArrayDeque} performance.
    UnboundedBufferArray
    a FIFO buffer implemented as a (resizable) Object Array.
    UnboundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized
    an unbounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array that's totally unsynchronized.
    UnboundedMsgPassingCoordinator
    Exactly the same as MsgPassingCoordinator except that its queue is unbounded, and therefore cannot throw ParallelException in cases where having a full queue would throw.
    UnboundedSimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator
    Exactly the same as SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator except that its queue is unbounded, and therefore cannot throw ParallelException in cases where having a full queue would throw.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParallelException
    generic exception class for the parallel package.
    ParallelExceptionUnsubmittedTasks
    encapsulates any unsubmitted tasks to executors.

Package parallel Description

parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.

Package Specification

Primitives required for the parallel implementation of the optimization algorithms in this library, including semaphores, atomic execution of critical sections, message passing, read/write shared/exclusive access (with built-in checking of the validity of the calls), barrier and ordered barriers, thread-pools and limited-time task executors.
